    swplot.clear

    clears swplot figure

    Syntax

    swplot.clear

    swplot.clear(hFigure)

    Description

    swplot.clear clears the active swplot figure.

    swplot.clear(hFigure) clears the swplot figure correspondign to hFigure handle

    See Also

    swplot.figure
